SEARCH
Package Helpers.ServerHelpers

Class ActionOrderStatus

java.lang.Object
Helpers.ServerHelpers.ActionOrderStatus
public class ActionOrderStatus extends Object
Helper class that constructs a Message to be sent back to the client with their order status information.

    • getAreaStatusDetails

      private String getAreaStatusDetails(Map<String,Map<DrinkType,Long>> numberOfDrinksByDrinkTypeByArea, String area)
      Generates a String from numberOfDrinksByDrinkTypeByArea. The resulting String contains the number and type of drinks from each area that contains drinks for the client, area information does not get generated if no drinks are in that area.
      Parameters:
      numberOfDrinksByDrinkTypeByArea - number of drinks mapped by type and then area
      area - name of area
      Returns:
      a String that consists of the details of each area
